house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1952 has 5 bedroom(s), 7 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, patio, fireplace, fire sprinklers.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.fireplace: Family Room, Gas logs, Living Room
residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings,Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Fire Sprinklers, GameRoom, Garage Door Opener, Great Room, Guest Room, Kitchen Island,Library, Microwave, Pantry, Ranch Style, Wet Bar
